des:
IMPORTANT: 

BestCon skill for Amazon Alexa lets you interact with your BestCon devices by voice.

To get started:

1. Sign up / sign in BestCon App
Download and install BestCon App and sign up a BestCon account.

2. Add device
Make sure the Wi-Fi device has been correctly configured in BestCon App and you can remotely control/access it via external networks (3G/4G). 

3. Enable skill
In Alexa App, search and enable the skill “BestCon”. Then follow the wizard to link your Amazon account to BestCon account. 
After account linking process is completed, discover devices in Alexa App or say “Alexa, discover devices” and make sure devices are listed and displayed as same names in BestCon App.

NOTE: You need to discover device again in Alexa App if one of the following changes were made:
Added or deleted device,
The device has been reset.

4. Control device by voice

Now you can say to Alexa for voice control.
When using the skill, you will need to specify by name which device to use. 

Troubleshooting:
If Alexa returns voice the device isn’t responding, there might be because the device is offline. Please try to access the device in BestCon App. If the App shows “Device is offline”, please check your network connection until you can access the device in app.
